005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.util;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModelNodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModelDefinition;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.INamedModelInstance;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.IBoundModule;
020
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.PrintWriter;
023
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
025
026public class MermaidErDiagramGenerator
027    extends AbstractRecursionPreventingNodeItemVisitor<PrintWriter, Void> {
028
029  private enum Relationship {
030    ZERO_OR_ONE("|o", "o|"),
031    ONE("||", "||"),
032    ZERO_OR_MORE("}o", "o{"),
033    ONE_OR_MORE("}|", "|{");
034
035    @NonNull
036    private final String left;
037    @NonNull
038    private final String right;
039
040    Relationship(@NonNull String left, @NonNull String right) {
041      this.left = left;
042      this.right = right;
043    }
044
045    @NonNull
046    public String getLeft() {
047      return left;
048    }
049
050    @NonNull
051    public String getRight() {
052      return right;
053    }
054
055    @NonNull
056    public static Relationship toRelationship(int minOccurs, int maxOccurs) {
057      return minOccurs < 1
058          ? maxOccurs == 1
059              ? ZERO_OR_ONE
060              : ZERO_OR_MORE
061          : maxOccurs == 1
062              ? ONE
063              : ONE_OR_MORE;
064    }
065
066    private String generate() {
067      return getLeft() + "--" + getRight();
068    }
069  }
070
071  @Override
072  public Void visitField(IFieldNodeItem item, PrintWriter writer) {
073    processNodeItem(item, writer);
074    return super.visitField(item, writer);
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyNodeItem item, PrintWriter writer) {
079    processNodeItem(item, writer);
080    return super.visitAssembly(item, writer);
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public Void visitAssembly(IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem item, PrintWriter writer) {
085    processNodeItem(item, writer);
086    return super.visitAssembly(item, writer);
087  }
088
089  @Override
090  protected Void defaultResult() {
091    return null;
092  }
093
094  private void processNodeItem(@NonNull IModelNodeItem<?, ?> item, PrintWriter writer) {
095    IAssemblyNodeItem left = item.getParentContentNodeItem();
096
097    IAssemblyDefinition leftDefinition = left.getDefinition();
098    INamedModelInstance rightInstance = item.getInstance();
099    IModelDefinition rightDefinition = item.getDefinition();
100
101    Relationship relationship
102        = Relationship.toRelationship(rightInstance.getMinOccurs(), rightInstance.getMaxOccurs());
103
104    writer.format("  %s %s %s : %s%n",
105        leftDefinition.getEffectiveName(),
106        relationship.generate(),
107        rightDefinition.getEffectiveName(),
108        rightInstance.getEffectiveName());
109  }
110
111  public void generate(@NonNull IBoundModule module, @NonNull PrintWriter writer) throws IOException {
112    IModuleNodeItem moduleItem = INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module);
113
114    for (IAssemblyDefinition root : module.getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitions()) {
115      for (IModelNodeItem<?, ?> rootItem : moduleItem.getModelItemsByName(root.getDefinitionQName())) {
116        IAssemblyDefinition definition = (IAssemblyDefinition) rootItem.getDefinition();
117
118        writer.println("erDiagram");
119        writer.format("  module ||--|| %s: \"%s\"%n", definition.getEffectiveName(), definition.getRootName());
120
121        for (IModelNodeItem<?, ?> modelItem : CollectionUtil.toIterable(rootItem.modelItems())) {
122          modelItem.accept(this, writer);
123        }
124      }
125    }
126  }
127}
